00123 template<class SegmentData>
00124 bool TMultiPolylineCalibrationShape<SegmentData>::OnMouseButton(istd::CIndex2d position, Qt::MouseButton buttonType, bool downFlag)
00125 {
00126        imod::IModel* modelPtr = GetModelPtr();
00127        iview::TMultiPolyline<SegmentData>* polylinePtr = dynamic_cast<iview::TMultiPolyline<SegmentData>*>(modelPtr);
00128        if (IsDisplayConnected() && (polylinePtr != NULL)){
00129               if (downFlag){
00130                      const iview::IColorShema& colorShema = GetColorShema();
00131                      const iview::CScreenTransform& transform = GetLogToScreenTransform();
00132                      const iview::IIsomorphicCalibration& calib = GetIsomorphCalib();
00133 
00134                      i2d::CVector2d viewMouse = transform.GetClientPosition(position);
00135                      i2d::CVector2d logMouse;
00136                      calib.GetApplyToLog(viewMouse, logMouse);
00137 
00138                      int nodesCount = polylinePtr->GetNodesCount();
00139                      int editMode = GetEditMode();
00140 
00141                      switch (editMode){
00142                      case iview::ISelectable::EM_NONE:
00143                             if (IsSelected() && CTransformableRectangleCalibrationShape::OnMouseButton(position, buttonType, downFlag)){
00144                                    return true;
00145                             }
00146                             if (TrySelectSegments(*polylinePtr, position)){
00147                                    return true;
00148                             }
00149                             break;
00150 
00151                      case iview::ISelectable::EM_MOVE:
00152                             {
00153                                    const i2d::CRect& tickerBox = colorShema.GetTickerBox(iview::IColorShema::TT_MOVE);
00154 
00155                                    for (int i = nodesCount - 1; i >= 0; --i){
00156                                           const i2d::CVector2d& logPos = polylinePtr->GetNode(i);
00157                                           i2d::CVector2d viewPos;
00158                                           calib.GetApplyToView(logPos, viewPos);
00159                                           istd::CIndex2d screenPos = transform.GetScreenPosition(viewPos);
00160                                           if (tickerBox.IsInside(position - screenPos)){
00161                                                  m_referencePosition = logPos - logMouse;
00162                                                  m_referenceIndex = i;
00163 
00164                                                  BeginModelChanges();
00165                                                  return true;
00166                                           }
00167                                    }
00168                             }
00169                             if (TrySelectSegments(*polylinePtr, position)){
00170                                    return true;
00171                             }
00172                             break;
00173 
00174                      case iview::ISelectable::EM_ADD:
00175                             {
00176                                    i2d::CVector2d logLast;
00177                                    const i2d::CRect& tickerBox = colorShema.GetTickerBox(iview::IColorShema::TT_INSERT);
00178 
00179                                    if (!polylinePtr->IsClosed()){
00180                                           logLast = polylinePtr->GetNode(nodesCount - 1);
00181                                    }
00182                                    else{
00183                                           logLast = GetSegmentMiddle(nodesCount - 1);
00184                                    }
00185                                    i2d::CVector2d viewLast;
00186                                    calib.GetApplyToView(logLast, viewLast);
00187                                    istd::CIndex2d screenLast = transform.GetScreenPosition(viewLast);
00188                                    if (tickerBox.IsInside(position - screenLast)){
00189                                           BeginModelChanges();
00190                                           if (polylinePtr->InsertNode(logLast)){
00191                                                  m_referencePosition = logLast - logMouse;
00192                                                  m_referenceIndex = nodesCount;
00193 
00194                                                  UpdateModelChanges();
00195                                                  return true;
00196                                           }
00197                                    }
00198                                    for (int i = nodesCount - 2; i >= 0; --i){
00199                                           i2d::CVector2d logPos = GetSegmentMiddle(i);
00200                                           i2d::CVector2d viewPos;
00201                                           calib.GetApplyToView(logPos, viewPos);
00202                                           istd::CIndex2d screenPos = transform.GetScreenPosition(viewPos);
00203                                           if (tickerBox.IsInside(position - screenPos)){
00204                                                  BeginModelChanges();
00205                                                  if (polylinePtr->InsertNode(i + 1, logPos)){
00206                                                         m_referencePosition = logPos - logMouse;
00207                                                         m_referenceIndex = i + 1;
00208 
00209                                                         UpdateModelChanges();
00210                                                         return true;
00211                                                  }
00212                                           }
00213                                    }
00214                                    if (!polylinePtr->IsClosed()){
00215                                           i2d::CVector2d logFirst = polylinePtr->GetNode(0);
00216                                           i2d::CVector2d viewFirst;
00217                                           calib.GetApplyToView(logFirst, viewFirst);
00218                                           istd::CIndex2d screenFirst = transform.GetScreenPosition(viewFirst);
00219                                           if (tickerBox.IsInside(position - screenFirst)){
00220                                                  BeginModelChanges();
00221                                                  if (polylinePtr->InsertNode(0, logFirst)){
00222                                                         m_referencePosition = logFirst - logMouse;
00223                                                         m_referenceIndex = 0;
00224 
00225                                                         UpdateModelChanges();
00226                                                         return true;
00227                                                  }
00228                                           }
00229                                    }
00230                             }
00231                             break;
00232 
00233                      case iview::ISelectable::EM_REMOVE:
00234                             {
00235                                    if (nodesCount > 2){
00236                                           const i2d::CRect& tickerBox = colorShema.GetTickerBox(iview::IColorShema::TT_INSERT);
00237 
00238                                           i2d::CVector2d first, second, viewPos;
00239                                           istd::CIndex2d screenPos;
00240                                           bool removed = false;
00241 
00242                                           int segmentsCount = polylinePtr->GetSegmentsCount();
00243                                           for (int i = 0; i < segmentsCount; i++){
00244                                                  CalculateRemovePoints(*polylinePtr, i, first, second);
00245 
00246                                                  calib.GetApplyToView(first, viewPos);
00247                                                  screenPos = transform.GetScreenPosition(viewPos);
00248                                                  if (tickerBox.IsInside(position - screenPos)){
00249                                                         BeginModelChanges();
00250 
00251                                                         polylinePtr->RemoveSegment(i,i);
00252 
00253                                                         EndModelChanges();
00254                                                         return true;
00255                                                  }
00256                                                  calib.GetApplyToView(second, viewPos);
00257                                                  screenPos = transform.GetScreenPosition(viewPos);
00258                                                  if (tickerBox.IsInside(position - screenPos)){
00259                                                         BeginModelChanges();
00260 
00261                                                         polylinePtr->RemoveSegment(i + 1, i);
00262 
00263                                                         EndModelChanges();
00264                                                         return true;
00265                                                  }
00266                                           }
00267                                    }
00268                             }
00269                             break;
00270                      }
00271               }
00272        }
00273 
00274        EndModelChanges();
00275 
00276        return false;
00277 }

00293 template<class SegmentData>
00294 void TMultiPolylineCalibrationShape<SegmentData>::DrawCurve(QPainter& drawContext) const
00295 {
00296        I_ASSERT(IsDisplayConnected());
00297 
00298        BaseClass::DrawCurve(drawContext);
00299 
00300        if (IsSelected()){
00301               const iview::TMultiPolyline<SegmentData>* polylinePtr =
00302                                           dynamic_cast<const iview::TMultiPolyline<SegmentData>*>(GetModelPtr());
00303               if (polylinePtr != NULL){
00304                      const iview::IColorShema& colorShema = GetColorShema();
00305                      int nodesCount = polylinePtr->GetNodesCount();
00306                      if (nodesCount > 1){
00307                             int segmentsCount = polylinePtr->GetSegmentsCount();
00308                             int parallelsCount = polylinePtr->GetParallelsCount();
00309 
00310                             i2d::CVector2d firstKneeVector = polylinePtr->GetKneeVector(0);
00311                             i2d::CVector2d firstPoint = polylinePtr->GetNode(0);
00312 
00313                             const iview::CScreenTransform& transform = GetLogToScreenTransform();
00314                             const iview::IIsomorphicCalibration& calib = GetIsomorphCalib();
00315 
00316                             bool showOrientation = IsOrientationVisible() && (parallelsCount > 0);
00317 
00318                             for (int segmentIndex = 0; segmentIndex < segmentsCount; ++segmentIndex){
00319                                    int nodeIndex = (segmentIndex + 1) % nodesCount;
00320                                    i2d::CVector2d secondKneeVector = polylinePtr->GetKneeVector(nodeIndex);
00321                                    const i2d::CVector2d& secondPoint = polylinePtr->GetNode(nodeIndex);
00322 
00323                                    double parallelAverage = 0;
00324 
00325                                    for (int parallelIndex = 0; parallelIndex < parallelsCount; ++parallelIndex){
00326                                           double parallel = polylinePtr->GetParallel(segmentIndex, parallelIndex);
00327                                           
00328                                           parallelAverage += ::fabs(parallel);
00329 
00330                                           i2d::CVector2d viewPos;
00331                                           calib.GetApplyToView(firstPoint + firstKneeVector * parallel, viewPos);
00332                                           istd::CIndex2d screenPoint1 = transform.GetScreenPosition(viewPos);
00333                                           calib.GetApplyToView(secondPoint + secondKneeVector * parallel, viewPos);
00334                                           istd::CIndex2d screenPoint2 = transform.GetScreenPosition(viewPos);
00335 
00336                                           if (polylinePtr->IsSegmentSelected(segmentIndex)){
00337                                                  drawContext.PushPen(colorShema.GetPen(iview::IColorShema::SP_SELECTED_DASH));
00338                                           }
00339                                           else{
00340                                                  drawContext.PushPen(colorShema.GetPen(iview::IColorShema::SP_NORMAL_DASH));
00341                                           }
00342 
00343                                           drawContext.drawLine(screenPoint1, screenPoint2);
00344 
00345                                           drawContext.restore();
00346                                    }
00347                                    if ((firstPoint.GetDistance(secondPoint) > I_EPSILON) && showOrientation){
00348                                           parallelAverage /= parallelsCount;
00349 
00350                                           i2d::CVector2d delta = (secondPoint - firstPoint).GetNormalized(parallelAverage);
00351 
00352                                           i2d::CVector2d orthogonalized = delta.GetOrthogonal();
00353 
00354                                           i2d::CVector2d viewArrowBegin;
00355                                           i2d::CVector2d viewArrowLeft;
00356                                           i2d::CVector2d viewArrowRight;
00357                                           calib.GetApplyToView(firstPoint, viewArrowBegin);
00358                                           calib.GetApplyToView(firstPoint + delta + orthogonalized, viewArrowLeft);
00359                                           calib.GetApplyToView(firstPoint + delta - orthogonalized, viewArrowRight);
00360                                           istd::CIndex2d screenArrowBegin = transform.GetScreenPosition(viewArrowBegin);
00361                                           istd::CIndex2d screenArrowLeft = transform.GetScreenPosition(viewArrowLeft);
00362                                           istd::CIndex2d screenArrowRight = transform.GetScreenPosition(viewArrowRight);
00363 
00364                                           drawContext.PushPen(colorShema.GetPen(iview::IColorShema::SP_SELECTED));
00365                                           
00366                                           drawContext.drawLine(screenArrowBegin, screenArrowLeft);
00367                                           drawContext.drawLine(screenArrowBegin, screenArrowRight);
00368 
00369                                           drawContext.restore();
00370                                    }
00371 
00372                                    firstPoint = secondPoint;
00373                                    firstKneeVector = secondKneeVector;
00374                             }
00375                      }
00376               }
00377        }
00378 }

00381 template<class SegmentData>
00382 void TMultiPolylineCalibrationShape<SegmentData>::DrawSelectionElements(QPainter& drawContext) const
00383 {
00384        const iview::TMultiPolyline<SegmentData>* polylinePtr =
00385                                           dynamic_cast<const iview::TMultiPolyline<SegmentData>*>(GetModelPtr());
00386        if (IsDisplayConnected() && (polylinePtr != NULL)){
00387         const iview::IColorShema& colorShema = GetColorShema();
00388               int nodesCount = polylinePtr->GetNodesCount();
00389               int editMode = GetEditMode();
00390 
00391               const iview::CScreenTransform& transform = GetLogToScreenTransform();
00392               const iview::IIsomorphicCalibration& calib = GetIsomorphCalib();
00393 
00394               for (int i = 0; i < nodesCount; i++){
00395                      i2d::CVector2d viewPos;
00396                      calib.GetApplyToView(polylinePtr->GetNode(i), viewPos);
00397                      istd::CIndex2d screenPos = transform.GetScreenPosition(viewPos);
00398 
00399                      if ((editMode == iview::ISelectable::EM_MOVE)){
00400                             colorShema.DrawTicker(drawContext, screenPos, iview::IColorShema::TT_MOVE);
00401                      }
00402                      else if ((editMode != iview::ISelectable::EM_ADD) || ((i != 0) && (i != nodesCount - 1))){
00403                             colorShema.DrawTicker(drawContext, screenPos, iview::IColorShema::TT_SELECTED_INACTIVE);
00404                      }
00405               }
00406               if (nodesCount > 0){
00407                      switch (editMode){
00408                      case iview::ISelectable::EM_NONE:
00409                             DrawFigure(drawContext);
00410                             DrawTickers(drawContext);
00411                             break;
00412 
00413                      case iview::ISelectable::EM_ADD:
00414                             {
00415                                    istd::CIndex2d screenPos;
00416                                    i2d::CVector2d viewPos;
00417                                    if (!polylinePtr->IsClosed()){
00418                                           calib.GetApplyToView(polylinePtr->GetNode(0), viewPos);
00419                                           screenPos = transform.GetScreenPosition(viewPos);
00420                                           colorShema.DrawTicker(drawContext, screenPos, iview::IColorShema::TT_INSERT);
00421                                    }
00422 
00423                                    int segmentsCount = polylinePtr->GetSegmentsCount();
00424                                    for (int i = 0; i < segmentsCount; i++){
00425                                           calib.GetApplyToView(GetSegmentMiddle(i), viewPos);
00426                                           screenPos = transform.GetScreenPosition(viewPos);
00427 
00428                                           colorShema.DrawTicker(drawContext, screenPos, iview::IColorShema::TT_INSERT);
00429                                    }
00430 
00431                                    if (!polylinePtr->IsClosed()){
00432                                           calib.GetApplyToView(polylinePtr->GetNode(nodesCount - 1), viewPos);
00433                                           screenPos = transform.GetScreenPosition(viewPos);
00434                                           colorShema.DrawTicker(drawContext, screenPos, iview::IColorShema::TT_INSERT);
00435                                    }
00436                             }
00437                             break;
00438 
00439                      case iview::ISelectable::EM_REMOVE:
00440                             {
00441                                    if (nodesCount > 2){
00442                                           i2d::CVector2d first, second;
00443 
00444                                           int segmentsCount = polylinePtr->GetSegmentsCount();
00445                                           for (int i = 0; i < segmentsCount; i++){
00446                                                  CalculateRemovePoints(*polylinePtr, i, first, second);
00447 
00448                                                  i2d::CVector2d viewPos;
00449                                                  calib.GetApplyToView(first, viewPos);
00450                                                  istd::CIndex2d screenPos = transform.GetScreenPosition(viewPos);
00451                                                  colorShema.DrawTicker(drawContext, screenPos, iview::IColorShema::TT_DELETE);
00452                                                  calib.GetApplyToView(second, viewPos);
00453                                                  screenPos = transform.GetScreenPosition(viewPos);
00454                                                  colorShema.DrawTicker(drawContext, screenPos, iview::IColorShema::TT_DELETE);
00455                                           }
00456                                    }
00457                             }
00458                             break;
00459                      }
00460               }
00461        }
00462 }

00464 
00465 template<class SegmentData>
00466 bool TMultiPolylineCalibrationShape<SegmentData>::IsCurveTouched(istd::CIndex2d position) const
00467 {
00468        I_ASSERT(IsDisplayConnected());
00469 
00470        const iview::TMultiPolyline<SegmentData>* polylinePtr =
00471                                    dynamic_cast<const iview::TMultiPolyline<SegmentData>*>(GetModelPtr());
00472        if (polylinePtr != NULL){
00473         const iview::IColorShema& colorShema = GetColorShema();
00474               const iview::CScreenTransform& transform = GetLogToScreenTransform();
00475               const iview::IIsomorphicCalibration& calib = GetIsomorphCalib();
00476 
00477               int nodesCount = polylinePtr->GetNodesCount();
00478 
00479               i2d::CVector2d node1;
00480               int i;
00481               if (polylinePtr->IsClosed()){
00482                      calib.GetApplyToView(polylinePtr->GetNode(nodesCount - 1), node1);
00483                      i = 0;
00484               }
00485               else{
00486                      calib.GetApplyToView(polylinePtr->GetNode(0), node1);
00487                      i = 1;
00488               }
00489 
00490               double logicalLineWidth = colorShema.GetLogicalLineWidth();
00491 
00492               double proportions = ::sqrt(transform.GetDeformMatrix().GetDet());
00493               const i2d::CVector2d& viewMouse = transform.GetClientPosition(position);
00494 
00495               for (; i < nodesCount; i++){
00496                      i2d::CVector2d node2;
00497                      calib.GetApplyToView(polylinePtr->GetNode(i), node2);
00498                      
00499                      i2d::CVector2d delta = node2 - node1;
00500 
00501                      if ((delta.GetDotProduct(viewMouse - node1) >= 0) && (delta.GetDotProduct(viewMouse - node2) <= 0)){
00502                             i2d::CVector2d ortonormal = delta.GetOrthogonal().GetNormalized();
00503                             double distance = ::fabs(ortonormal.GetDotProduct(viewMouse - node1));
00504                             if (proportions * distance < logicalLineWidth){
00505                                    return true;
00506                             }
00507                      }
00508 
00509                      node1 = node2;
00510               }
00511        }
00512 
00513        return false;
00514 }
00515 
00516 
00517 template<class SegmentData>
00518 bool TMultiPolylineCalibrationShape<SegmentData>::TrySelectSegments(
00519                             iview::TMultiPolyline<SegmentData>& polyline,
00520                             istd::CIndex2d position)
00521 {
00522        imod::IModel* modelPtr = GetModelPtr();
00523        if (IsDisplayConnected() && (modelPtr != NULL)){
00524               const iview::IColorShema& colorShema = GetColorShema();
00525 
00526               int nodesCount = polyline.GetNodesCount();
00527               const iview::CScreenTransform& transform = GetLogToScreenTransform();
00528               const iview::IIsomorphicCalibration& calib = GetIsomorphCalib();
00529 
00530               double proportions = ::sqrt(transform.GetDeformMatrix().GetDet());
00531 
00532               int nodeIndex;
00533               i2d::CVector2d node1;
00534               if (polyline.IsClosed()){
00535                      calib.GetApplyToView(polyline.GetNode(nodesCount - 1), node1);
00536                      nodeIndex = 0;
00537               }
00538               else{
00539                      calib.GetApplyToView(polyline.GetNode(0), node1);
00540                      nodeIndex = 1;
00541               }
00542 
00543               double logicalLineWidth = colorShema.GetLogicalLineWidth();
00544 
00545               for (; nodeIndex < nodesCount; nodeIndex++){
00546                      i2d::CVector2d node2;
00547                      calib.GetApplyToView(polyline.GetNode(nodeIndex), node2);
00548                      const i2d::CVector2d& viewMouse = transform.GetClientPosition(position);
00549 
00550                      i2d::CVector2d delta = node2 - node1;
00551 
00552                      if ((delta.GetDotProduct(viewMouse - node1) >= 0) && (delta.GetDotProduct(viewMouse - node2) <= 0)){
00553                             i2d::CVector2d ortonormal = delta.GetOrthogonal().GetNormalized();
00554                             double distance = ::fabs(ortonormal.GetDotProduct(viewMouse - node1));
00555                             if (proportions * distance < logicalLineWidth){
00556                                    int selectedSegment = nodeIndex - 1;
00557                                    bool selected = true;
00558                                    iview::int keysState = GetKeysState();
00559 
00560                                    if ((keysState & iview::ISelectable::KS_CONTROL) != 0){
00561                                           selected = !polyline.IsSegmentSelected(selectedSegment);
00562                                    }
00563                                    else if ((keysState & iview::ISelectable::KS_SHIFT) != 0){
00564                                           int firstSegment = selectedSegment - 1;
00565                                           int lastSegment = selectedSegment + 1;
00566 
00567                                           while ((firstSegment >= 0) && !polyline.IsSegmentSelected(firstSegment)){
00568                                                  firstSegment--;
00569                                           }
00570                                           if (firstSegment < 0){
00571                                                  firstSegment = selectedSegment;
00572                                           }
00573 
00574                                           int segmentsCount = polyline.GetSegmentsCount();
00575                                           while (lastSegment < segmentsCount && !polyline.IsSegmentSelected(lastSegment)){
00576                                                  lastSegment++;
00577                                           }
00578                                           if (lastSegment >= segmentsCount){
00579                                                  lastSegment = selectedSegment;
00580                                           }
00581 
00582                                           for (int currSegment = firstSegment; currSegment < lastSegment; currSegment++){
00583                                                  polyline.SelectSegment(currSegment, true);
00584                                           }
00585                                    }
00586                                    else{
00587                                           polyline.SelectAllSegments(false);
00588                                    }
00589                                    polyline.SelectSegment(nodeIndex - 1, selected);
00590 
00591                                    UpdateModelChanges();
00592                                    return true;
00593                             }
00594                      }
00595                      node1 = node2;
00596               }
00597        }
00598        return false;
00599 }
00600 
00601 
00602 template<class SegmentData>
00603 iview::ITouchable::TouchState TMultiPolylineCalibrationShape<SegmentData>::IsTouched(istd::CIndex2d position) const
00604 {
00605        const iview::TMultiPolyline<SegmentData>* polylinePtr =
00606                                    dynamic_cast<const iview::TMultiPolyline<SegmentData>*>(GetModelPtr());
00607        if (IsDisplayConnected() && (polylinePtr != NULL)){
00608         const iview::IColorShema& colorShema = GetColorShema();
00609 
00610               int nodesCount = polylinePtr->GetNodesCount();
00611 
00612               int editMode = GetEditMode();
00613 
00614               const iview::CScreenTransform& transform = GetLogToScreenTransform();
00615               const iview::IIsomorphicCalibration& calib = GetIsomorphCalib();
00616 
00617               switch (editMode){
00618               case iview::ISelectable::EM_NONE:
00619                      if (IsSelected()){
00620                             CTransformableRectangleCalibrationShape::EnsureValidNodes();
00621                             if (CTransformableRectangleCalibrationShape::IsTickerTouched(position)){
00622                                    return TS_TICKER;
00623                             }
00624 
00625                             if (CTransformableRectangleCalibrationShape::IsParallTouched(m_castTransform, position)){
00626                                    bool isEditablePosition = IsEditablePosition();
00627                                    return isEditablePosition? TS_DRAGGABLE: TS_INACTIVE;
00628                             }
00629                      }
00630                      break;
00631 
00632               case iview::ISelectable::EM_MOVE:
00633                      {
00634                             const i2d::CRect& tickerBox = colorShema.GetTickerBox(iview::IColorShema::TT_MOVE);
00635 
00636                             for (int i = 0; i < nodesCount; i++){
00637                                    i2d::CVector2d viewPos;
00638                                    calib.GetApplyToView(polylinePtr->GetNode(i), viewPos);
00639                                    istd::CIndex2d screenPos = transform.GetScreenPosition(viewPos);
00640                                    if (tickerBox.IsInside(position - screenPos)){
00641                                           return TS_TICKER;
00642                                    }
00643                             }
00644                      }
00645                      break;
00646 
00647               case iview::ISelectable::EM_ADD:
00648                      {
00649                             const i2d::CRect& tickerBox = colorShema.GetTickerBox(iview::IColorShema::TT_INSERT);
00650 
00651                             for (int i = 0; i < nodesCount; i++){
00652                                    istd::CIndex2d screenPos;
00653                                    i2d::CVector2d viewPos;
00654                                    if (i == 0 && !polylinePtr->IsClosed()){
00655                                           i2d::CVector2d viewPos;
00656                                           calib.GetApplyToView(polylinePtr->GetNode(i), viewPos);
00657                                           screenPos = transform.GetScreenPosition(viewPos);
00658                                           if (tickerBox.IsInside(position - screenPos)){
00659                                                  return TS_TICKER;
00660                                           }
00661                                    }
00662 
00663                                    if (i == (nodesCount - 1) && !polylinePtr->IsClosed()){
00664                                           calib.GetApplyToView(polylinePtr->GetNode(i), viewPos);
00665                                           screenPos = transform.GetScreenPosition(viewPos);
00666                                           if (tickerBox.IsInside(position - screenPos)){
00667                                                  return TS_TICKER;
00668                                           }
00669                                    }
00670 
00671                                    calib.GetApplyToView((polylinePtr->GetNode(i) + polylinePtr->GetNode((i+1) % nodesCount)) * 0.5, viewPos);
00672                                    screenPos = transform.GetScreenPosition(viewPos);
00673                                    if (tickerBox.IsInside(position - screenPos)){
00674                                           return TS_TICKER;
00675                                    }
00676                             }
00677                      }
00678                      break;
00679 
00680               case iview::ISelectable::EM_REMOVE:
00681                      {
00682                             i2d::CVector2d first, second;
00683 
00684                             const i2d::CRect& tickerBox = colorShema.GetTickerBox(iview::IColorShema::TT_DELETE);
00685 
00686                             int segmentsCount = polylinePtr->GetSegmentsCount();
00687                             for (int i = 0; i < segmentsCount; i++){
00688                                    CalculateRemovePoints(*polylinePtr, i, first, second);
00689 
00690                                    i2d::CVector2d viewPos;
00691                                    calib.GetApplyToView(first, viewPos);
00692                                    istd::CIndex2d screenPos = transform.GetScreenPosition(viewPos);
00693                                    if (tickerBox.IsInside(position - screenPos)){
00694                                           return TS_TICKER;
00695                                    }
00696                                    calib.GetApplyToView(second, viewPos);
00697                                    screenPos = transform.GetScreenPosition(viewPos);
00698                                    if (tickerBox.IsInside(position - screenPos)){
00699                                           return TS_TICKER;
00700                                    }
00701                             }
00702                      }
00703                      break;
00704               }
00705 
00706               if (IsCurveTouched(position)){
00707                      if (IsAlwaysMovable()){
00708                             return TS_DRAGGABLE;
00709                      }
00710                      else if ((editMode == iview::ISelectable::EM_NONE) || (editMode == iview::ISelectable::EM_MOVE)){
00711                             return TS_OTHER;
00712                      }
00713                      else{
00714                             return TS_INACTIVE;
00715                      }
00716               }
00717        }
00718 
00719        return TS_NONE;
00720 }
00721 
00722 
00723 template<class SegmentData>
00724 void  TMultiPolylineCalibrationShape<SegmentData>::SetSelected(bool selectFlag)
00725 {
00726        iview::TMultiPolyline<SegmentData>* polylinePtr =
00727                                    dynamic_cast<iview::TMultiPolyline<SegmentData>*>(GetModelPtr());
00728        if (polylinePtr != NULL){
00729               if (IsSelected() != selectFlag){
00730                      if (selectFlag){
00731                             polylinePtr->SelectAllSegments(true);
00732                      }
00733                      else{
00734                             polylinePtr->SelectAllSegments(false);
00735                      }
00736               }
00737        }
00738     BaseClass::SetSelected(selectFlag);
00739 }
00740 
00741 
00742 template<class SegmentData>
00743 void TMultiPolylineCalibrationShape<SegmentData>::CalcBoundingBox(i2d::CRect& result) const
00744 {
00745        const iview::TMultiPolyline<SegmentData>* polylinePtr =
00746                                    dynamic_cast<const iview::TMultiPolyline<SegmentData>*>(GetModelPtr());
00747        if (IsDisplayConnected() && (polylinePtr != NULL)){
00748               int nodesCount = polylinePtr->GetNodesCount();
00749               int segmentsCount = polylinePtr->GetSegmentsCount();
00750               
00751               int parallelCount = polylinePtr->GetParallelsCount();
00752 
00753               BaseClass::CalcBoundingBox(result);
00754 
00755               if (segmentsCount > 0){
00756                      const iview::CScreenTransform& transform = GetLogToScreenTransform();
00757                      const iview::IIsomorphicCalibration& calib = GetIsomorphCalib();
00758 
00759                      for (int i = 0; i < nodesCount; i++){
00760                             const i2d::CVector2d& position = polylinePtr->GetNode(i);
00761                             const i2d::CVector2d& knee = polylinePtr->GetKneeVector(i);
00762                             int segmentIndex = i % segmentsCount;
00763                             for (int parallelIndex = 0; parallelIndex < parallelCount; ++parallelIndex){
00764                                    double parallelValue = polylinePtr->GetParallel(segmentIndex, parallelIndex);
00765                                    i2d::CVector2d edgePos = position + knee * parallelValue;
00766                                    i2d::CVector2d edgeView;
00767                                    calib.GetApplyToView(edgePos, edgeView);
00768                                    result.Union(transform.GetScreenPosition(edgeView));
00769                             }
00770                             segmentIndex = (i + 1) % segmentsCount;
00771                             for (parallelIndex = 0; parallelIndex < parallelCount; ++parallelIndex){
00772                                    double parallelValue = polylinePtr->GetParallel(segmentIndex, parallelIndex);
00773                                    i2d::CVector2d edgePos = position + knee * parallelValue;
00774                                    i2d::CVector2d edgeView;
00775                                    calib.GetApplyToView(edgePos, edgeView);
00776                                    result.Union(transform.GetScreenPosition(edgeView));
00777                             }
00778                      }
00779               }
00780               
00781               result.SetBottom(result.GetBottom() + 1);
00782               result.SetRight(result.GetRight() + 1);
00783 
00784               return;
00785        }
00786 
00787        result.Reset(); 
00788 }
00789 
00790 
00791 // protected methods
00792 
00793 template<class SegmentData>
00794 void TMultiPolylineCalibrationShape<SegmentData>::CalculateRemovePoints(const iview::TMultiPolyline<SegmentData>& polyline, int segment, i2d::CVector2d& first, i2d::CVector2d& second) const
00795 {
00796        int nodesCount = polyline.GetNodesCount();
00797     i2d::CVector2d line = polyline.GetNode((segment+1) % nodesCount) - polyline.GetNode(segment);
00798     first = polyline.GetNode(segment) + line * 0.2;
00799     second = polyline.GetNode(segment) + line * 0.8;
00800 }
00801 
00802 
00803 // reimplemented (iview::CInteractiveTransformableRectangle)
00804 
00805 template<class SegmentData>
00806 void TMultiPolylineCalibrationShape<SegmentData>::EnsureValidNodes() const
00807 {
00808        if (!AreNodesValid()){
00809               const iview::TMultiPolyline<SegmentData>* polylinePtr =
00810                                           dynamic_cast<const iview::TMultiPolyline<SegmentData>*>(GetModelPtr());
00811               if (polylinePtr != NULL){
00812                      i2d::CVector2d axisX = m_castAxis.GetNormalized();
00813                      i2d::CVector2d axisY = axisX.GetOrthogonal();
00814 
00815                      int nodesCount = polylinePtr->GetNodesCount();
00816                      int segmentsCount = polylinePtr->GetSegmentsCount();
00817                      if (nodesCount > 0){
00818                             const i2d::CVector2d& firstNode = polylinePtr->GetNode(0);
00819 
00820                             i2d::CVector2d minPosition(axisX.GetDotProduct(firstNode), axisY.GetDotProduct(firstNode));
00821                             i2d::CVector2d maxPosition = minPosition;
00822 
00823                             int parallelCount = polylinePtr->GetParallelsCount();
00824                             for (int i = 0; i < nodesCount; i++){
00825                                    const i2d::CVector2d& position = polylinePtr->GetNode(i);
00826 
00827                                    i2d::CVector2d castedPosition(axisX.GetDotProduct(position), axisY.GetDotProduct(position));
00828 
00829                                    if (castedPosition.GetSetX() < minPosition.GetSetX()){
00830                                           minPosition.SetSetX(castedPosition.GetSetX());
00831                                    }
00832                                    if (castedPosition.GetSetY() < minPosition.GetSetY()){
00833                                           minPosition.SetSetY(castedPosition.GetSetY());
00834                                    }
00835 
00836                                    if (castedPosition.GetSetX() > maxPosition.GetSetX()){
00837                                           maxPosition.SetSetX(castedPosition.GetSetX());
00838                                    }
00839                                    if (castedPosition.GetSetY() > maxPosition.GetSetY()){
00840                                           maxPosition.SetY(castedPosition.GetSetY());
00841                                    }
00842 
00843                                    const i2d::CVector2d& knee = polylinePtr->GetKneeVector(i);
00844                                    int segmentIndex = i % segmentsCount;
00845                                    for (int parallelIndex = 0; parallelIndex < parallelCount; ++parallelIndex){
00846                                           double parallelValue = polylinePtr->GetParallel(segmentIndex, parallelIndex);
00847                                           const i2d::CVector2d& edgePos = polylinePtr->GetNode(i) + knee * parallelValue;
00848 
00849                                           castedPosition = i2d::CVector2d(axisX.GetDotProduct(edgePos), axisY.GetDotProduct(edgePos));
00850 
00851                                           if (castedPosition.GetSetX() < minPosition.GetSetX()){
00852                                                  minPosition.SetX(castedPosition.GetSetX());
00853                                           }
00854                                           if (castedPosition.GetSetY() < minPosition.GetSetY()){
00855                                                  minPosition.SetY(castedPosition.GetSetY());
00856                                           }
00857 
00858                                           if (castedPosition.GetSetX() > maxPosition.GetSetX()){
00859                                                  maxPosition.SetX(castedPosition.GetSetX());
00860                                           }
00861                                           if (castedPosition.GetSetY() > maxPosition.GetSetY()){
00862                                                  maxPosition.SetY(castedPosition.GetSetY());
00863                                           }
00864                                    }
00865                                    segmentIndex = (i + 1) % segmentsCount;
00866                                    for (parallelIndex = 0; parallelIndex < parallelCount; ++parallelIndex){
00867                                           double parallelValue = polylinePtr->GetParallel(segmentIndex, parallelIndex);
00868                                           const i2d::CVector2d& edgePos = polylinePtr->GetNode(i) + knee * parallelValue;
00869 
00870                                           castedPosition = i2d::CVector2d(axisX.GetDotProduct(edgePos), axisY.GetDotProduct(edgePos));
00871 
00872                                           if (castedPosition.GetSetX() < minPosition.GetSetX()){
00873                                                  minPosition.SetX(castedPosition.GetSetX());
00874                                           }
00875                                           if (castedPosition.GetSetY() < minPosition.GetSetY()){
00876                                                  minPosition.SetY(castedPosition.GetSetY());
00877                                           }
00878 
00879                                           if (castedPosition.GetSetX() > maxPosition.GetSetX()){
00880                                                  maxPosition.SetX(castedPosition.GetSetX());
00881                                           }
00882                                           if (castedPosition.GetSetY() > maxPosition.GetSetY()){
00883                                                  maxPosition.SetY(castedPosition.GetSetY());
00884                                           }
00885                                    }
00886                             }
00887                             i2d::CVector2d delta = maxPosition - minPosition;
00888                             m_castTransform = i2d::CAffine2d(
00889                                                         i2d::CMatrix2d(axisX * delta.GetSetX(), axisY * delta.GetSetY()),
00890                                                         axisX * minPosition.GetSetX() + axisY * minPosition.GetSetY());
00891 
00892                             CalcNodes(m_castTransform);
00893                             return;
00894                      }
00895               }
00896               ResetNodes();
00897        }
00898 }
